mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_PILL.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_PILL(PILL_ID, CATEGORY_ID, PILL_NAME, UPDATE_DATE, DETAIL_CONTENT, PILL_HOWTO, SIDE_CAUTION, PILL_COLOR, PILL_SHAPE, PILL_DEPOSIT, PILL_IMAGE, COMPANY_NAME) VALUES (#{pillId}, #{categoryId}, #{pillName}, #{updateDate}, #{detailContent}, #{pillHowto}, #{sideCaution}, #{pillColor}, #{pillShape}, #{pillDeposit}, #{pillImage}, #{companyName})
